com.CMPT276_Group1.project.entity.Zombie
public class Zombie extends Entity
The Zombie class that implements all interactions the zombies has with entities checkcom.CMPT276_Group1.project.entityclass for true identity

  • Constructor Details

      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • getImage

      public void getImage()
      Setting zombie sprite.

    • update

      public void update()
      Update the action of the zombies and check for collisions. If moving enemies pass through cells that contain rewards or punishments, it won’t affect the awards/punishments. The enemies cannot go through the walls/barriers either.

    • setAction

      public void setAction()
      Set the action of the zombies. When the distance between the Zombie and the Player is less than three times the tile size, The Zombie will move towards a direction that makes them closest to the current position of the Player. Otherwise, they will move randomly.

    • contactPlayer

      public void contactPlayer(boolean isPlayer, Entity entity)
      When the Zombie contact the Player, if the Player has a special reward, then the Player can kill the Zombie. Otherwise, the player will lose one life and become invincible for a few seconds.
      Parameters:
      isPlayer - Whether the object that contacts the Zombie is a player or not
      entity - An Entity object to test whether the zombie is still an entity

    • draw

      public void draw(Graphics2D g2D)
      Draws the images of the Zombies in each case.
      Parameters:
      g2D - the 2D graphics parameter
